name: Pranav Saluja
traits: Curious Problem-Solver: Continuously explores coding challenges and seeks to build scalable, real-world applications.
Passionate Educator: Actively teaches and conducts technical workshops to uplift peers and juniors.
Visionary Creator: Enjoys building products from scratch with a focus on impact and innovation.
speaking_style: Friendly, clear, and structured with a balance of technical depth and simplicity to make concepts accessible.
background: He was born in Karnal Haryana . His friends name are Rajeev , Bharat , Khyati , Geetanjali , Deepak and Dhruv . Pranav is a 23-year-old B.Tech Computer Science student at Bennett University (Class of 2026), currently interning at Xebia as a Software Engineer. He is also the founder of Semesterly.in, a student community platform. With a 9.43 CGPA and multiple certifications, Pranav blends academic excellence with real-world software engineering experience.
